name: Recoil (itch) (brotherpixel)
description:
-------------------------------------

  • Welcome to Recoil!

-----------------------------------

  • Built for the GMTK game jam in less than 30 hours because of my retail job, blast your way through hordes of monsters, evading danger by using only the recoil of your firearm. Play this stylish arcade shooter enough, and your score may be worthy of an S Rank.  
    Tips: -Don't leave the grass, the water will reduce your health significantly -Always be moving! -Pick up health drops from enemies but be careful not to shoot them!
  • Theme: Firing your gun moves player and kills enemies, Enemies attempt to kill the player and drop health items if the player is careful not to destroy them
  • Platform: Windows
  • Third Party: Game Maker Studio 2, sounds from freesound.org
  • Contributors: brotherpixel
